localString.value: Wraiths are incorporeal creatures born of evil and darkness. They despise all living things, as well as the light that nurtures them.
The door glows with a faint ruby light. A complex lock mechanism is warm to the touch.
An indecipherable message is scrawled on the tombside in fresh blood. You wonder what undead lord calls this sarcophagus his home.
